name: BrainSkin
author: AFNI Developers
description: A program to create an unfolded surface that wraps the brain (skin) and Gyrification Indices.

inputs.description: Surface to smooth or the domain over which DSET is defined.
inputs.name: Surface

inputs.description: A high-res volume to provide a grid for voxelization steps.
inputs.name: Skin grid volume

inputs.description: Prefix to use for variety of output files.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Maximum length of path along surface in mm for node pairing.
inputs.name: Path limit

inputs.description: Maximum length of Euclidean distance in mm for node pairing.
inputs.name: Distance limit

inputs.description: Output a displayable object file that contains segments between paired nodes.
inputs.name: Segment display object

inputs.description: Voxelization method. Choose from: slow: Sure footed but slow, fast: Faster and works OK, mask: Fastest and works OK too (default).
inputs.name: Voxelize method

inputs.description: Infill method. Choose from: slow: proper infill, but not needed, fast: brutish infill, all we need (default).
inputs.name: Infill method

inputs.description: Output intermediary results from skin forming step.
inputs.name: Intermediate results file

inputs.description: Deform an Icosahedron to match the outer boundary of a mask volume.
inputs.name: Volume skin mask

inputs.description: Deform an Icosahedron to match the convex hull of a mask volume.
inputs.name: Volume hull mask

inputs.description: With vol_skin, the surface will try to shrink aggressively, even if there is no promise of non-zero values below.
inputs.name: No Zero Attraction

inputs.description: Output debugging information for node N for -vol_skin and -vol_hull options.
inputs.name: Node Debug

output-files.description: A bunch of triangles for closing the surface.
output-files.name: Stitch Surface

output-files.description: Reduced mesh version of initial skin surface.
output-files.name: Reduced Skin Surface

output-files.description: Original surface inflated inside skin surface.
output-files.name: Inflated Skin Surface

output-files.description: Results of computations for finding node pairs that span sulci.
output-files.name: Node Pairs Results

output-files.description: Results of computations for inflating initial surface inside skin surface.
output-files.name: Inflating Surface Results

output-files.description: Segments between node pairs spanning sulci.
output-files.name: Segments Display Object
